lensOptions.name: Achromatic with enhanced geometry
lensOptions.info: Layer without chromatic information, that visualizes the relighted surface by only using the shape information (i.e., the normal map layer), and the virtual light manually choosen by the user. An enhancing operator has been applied to provide a non-photorealistic/illustrative rendering that increases the perception of geometric behaviour across the object surface. This visualization allows for a pure geometric inspection of micro/meso/macro surface details.

lensOptions.name: Normal map
lensOptions.info: Layer with the color coded normal map field, which is useful to inspect the pure geometric surface behaviour. An enhancing operator has been applied to increase the perception of micro/meso/macro changes of normal signal across the surface.

lensOptions.name: Visible specular lighting
lensOptions.info: This option visualizes only the specular component of the Ward model used to represent the spatially-varying object material.
